column3: str

Vuyargur wishes to welcome Pelupelu patrons up the mountain.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the Yok Huy mountain guide in Worlar's Echo.
Deliver the requested item to the intrepid hiker.
Speak with Vuyargur.
Speak with the Yok Huy mountain guide in Worlar's Echo.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),9))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize a <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to the intrepid hiker</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),10))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize a <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to the intrepid hiker</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),11))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize a <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to the intrepid hiker</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),8))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize a <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to the intrepid hiker</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),12))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize a <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to the intrepid hiker</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),13))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize a <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to the intrepid hiker</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),14))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize a <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to the intrepid hiker</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),15))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize a <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to the intrepid hiker</If><Else/></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If>.
Speak with Vuyargur.
Great news, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Nopli tells me no few Pelupelu wish to visit Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
I inquired with Fahrafahr, and she agrees that our beautiful altar ought to live on in the memories of any and all who would behold it.
Do you recall that mountaineering paraphernalia you made for us? Well, it seems word of mouth has attracted more prospective hikers from Wachunpelo.
Worlar's Echo is preparing to receive them, but they require the aid of an artisan, and I'd like to send you.
When you arrive, speak to the mountain guide for your assignment. Safe travels!
I'm told you'll be providing me with the equipment I need to make the climb. I shall expect your very best work!
The moment I heard about Zirgorteh the Open-armed, I knew I had to see it for myself. For that, I'll need to gear up!
Thank you for coming down, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. This merchant placed an order with me, but I find I'm struggling to craft equipment for such small frames.
To complete this set of mountaineering paraphernalia, could you craft a pair of goggles to shield the eyes from the biting winds?
To complete this set of mountaineering paraphernalia, could you craft a pair of small-yet-sturdy snowshoes?
To complete this set of mountaineering paraphernalia, could you prepare a serving of rations to be stored in an insulated container?
In return, I'll furnish you with the materials you require. Say the word if you run short.
By all means, deliver the completed set directly to our Pelu friend here.
Having some trouble? I understand completely. Take these.
Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
Oh, I can't wait to see what you've made for me!
How did it go? Can I see it yet?
A worthy investment of coin, if I do say so myself. So long as I have this, I need fear no icy mountain trail!
The rumors don't do you justice, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I can but admire your craftsmanship.
Now then, let us begin the long climb!
Great work, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. A fully outfitted Pelupelu passed by just now, chatting pleasantly with the mountain guide on their way to the Breathless Altar.
Should anyone else take an interest in Zirgorteh the Open-armed, I hope we can count on you again.
